name: Click and fight
description:
Click and fight as long, as you can! Deal the damage to defeat powerful monsters and earn gold coins. Upgrade and buy brave heroes to fight for you. How many waves can you complete?

Features:
23 different monsters;
14 brave heroes;
5 locations;
6 magic artifacts;
3 skills;
3 costumes and 3 weapons;
15 achievements;

Coming soon:
Trading cards;
